summary: This document is an email correspondence between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley discussing a visit from Lisa Randall to Staley's daughter. The email highlights a personal connection and mentions a discussion about women in physics. The communication is marked as confidential and may contain privileged information.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the sender of the email, communicating with Jeffrey Epstein about a visit involving his daughter.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email to Jes Staley, discussing his connection to Staley's daughter and Lisa Randall.

persons.name: Lisa Randall
persons.context: Lisa Randall is mentioned in the email as someone who will spend time with Staley's daughter discussing women in physics.

connections.description: Jes Staley and Jeffrey Epstein are communicating about personal matters involving Staley's daughter.

keyFacts: The email was sent on September 8, 2009.
Jeffrey Epstein offers to have Lisa Randall spend time with Jes Staley's daughter.
The communication is marked as confidential and may contain privileged information.
